metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Black Hole Sun is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Black Hole Sun has sections analyzed in the following keys: G♯ Minor, A♭ Mixolydian, A♭ Major, G♯ Dorian,  and B♭ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
